item.title: 🦀 bugthesystem/Flux (302 ⭐)
item.description:
👤 Owner: bugthesystem

📝 Repository: bugthesystem/Flux

📄 Descrizione: Flux is a high-performance, zero-copy message transport (IPC, UDP, RUDP) library for Rust, designed for ultra-low-latency applications requiring maximum throughput. It is built on patterns & practices inspired by LMAX Disruptor and Aeron, with modern Rust optimizations.

⭐ Stelle: 302

🍴 Forks: 5
